title: Aqours Live Day 2!
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>That was such a fun performance~! We’re so lucky that we get to perform a second day~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Wow! You’re so energetic compared to yesterday~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Huh? Yesterday?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>You fell asleep yesterday after coming out of the shower without even drying your hair~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Huh!? R-Really!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Yup, that’s what happened.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Mhmm.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Umm...... Sorry everyone, I guess?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Don’t worry about it, zura.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yeah. Seeing how hard you worked yesterday gave me strength too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ehehe~! Then I’ll be depending on you all today, too. 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Since you’re feeling better today, Chika-san, you better dry your hair and lay out your futon yourself.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Okay~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Is anyone tired today? I’ll take care of you~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>......Doesn’t seem like it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>That’s because we had so much fun! My heart is still pounding!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Me too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I’m feeling great!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Okay, okay! I get how you all feel, but we better go to sleep! Today’s show is gonna be even better than yesterday’s!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Lights out~~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
